name: baby's first extispicy
description:
♫ ba ba young sheep give your life for me ♫

♫ lamby lamby tell me please ♫

WHAT IS THIS??

  • Baby's First Extispicy is a fortune-telling card game, based on the ritual of extispicy, where you divine the future by spilling sacrificial animal entrails.
  • Use the combination of cards and die to help make mundane decisions for your future!

WHAT YOU NEED

  • one (1) innocent, stuffed lamb
  • five (5) die: two (2) d4 of different shades, one (1) d8, one (1) d12, and one (1) d20 
  • one (1) black cloak
  • one (1) non lethal knife
  • one (1) sacrificial stand
  • the five (5) Baby's First Extispicy™ organ cards
  • (optional) 1 page ritual instruction zine

HOW2PLAY

  • Run the game & follow instructions (unless you printed the zine). By the end you should have the 5 cards laid out and one dice per card.
  • Use the buttons and arrow keys to view your card + dice combo.
  • ✸ 𝑠𝑝𝑒𝑐𝑖𝑎𝑙 𝑚𝑎𝑡𝑐ℎ ✸ Land a specific dice on a card to get a more specific reading. Four subcards instead of an organ card will show up.

CREDITS

  • Stephanie Styffe: Producer + Prop Maker + Programmer
  • Zella Rowe: Props Master
  • Grace Ho: Art Lead
  • Gustavo Cruz: Programming Lead
  • Roman Collazo: Writing Lead
